metadata.Title: CVE-2013-7439 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Multiple off-by-one errors in the (1) MakeBigReq and (2) SetReqLen macros in include/X11/Xlibint.h in X11R6.x and libX11 before 1.6.0 allow remote attackers to have unspecified impact via a crafted request, which triggers a buffer overflow.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-7439` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxrender1 - 1:0.9.8-1build0.14.04.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> all build dependencies that use the MakeBigReq macro, or that use the SetReqLen macro need to be rebuilt

criterions.comment: libxrender package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:0.9.8-1build0.14.04.1').
